originalText.text: We had a great experience at Bonjour NY last summer when my son was 3 and turning 4 in August, and we recently signed him up for this upcoming summer. The staff is very professional and the communication with parents is outstanding. The director was so sensitive to my concerns when before the camp started, I called to discuss whether my son would do okay on the field trips. There were so many fun, interesting activities planned for the children. My son was happy to go to camp and made friends. If you are looking for a great summer day camp with lots of classic camp activities with the added bonus of French exposure, this is a great camp. Furthermore, it's great for families looking for flexibility (you sign up for as many or few weeks as you would like and choose among options for hours, add-on classes).

originalText.text: My daughter has spent most of the summer in Hola camp and has really enjoyed it. The counselors are fun and caring, and everything seems well organized. Drop off and pick up has been easy even with COVID restrictions, and they plan a wide variety of activities to keep the kids entertained. Would definitely recommend!

text.text: My daughter has spent most of the summer in Hola camp and has really enjoyed it. The counselors are fun and caring, and everything seems well organized. Drop off and pick up has been easy even with COVID restrictions, and they plan a wide variety of activities to keep the kids entertained. Would definitely recommend!

originalText.text: Bonjour NY Manhattan was our first experience with a summer camp and it met all our expectations. Great and well organized program, good communication and the staff was always very friendly. The weekly field trips were a big highlight. What I really liked is that the kids were spending  most of the time outside! My daughter (4 yrs) had very little French knowledge, but that was not an issue. After the first week she got used to it and started to learn few words (mainly through songs). I highly recommend this program!

originalText.text: Very warm team. We loved that the camp organized a camp performance for families. It was my daughter's first time on stage and she just LOVED it. Needless to say she's also a big fan of the Glee classes. She came home singing and dancing EVERY DAY! Excellent camp, well managed and very educational.

text.text: Very warm team. We loved that the camp organized a camp performance for families. It was my daughter's first time on stage and she just LOVED it. Needless to say she's also a big fan of the Glee classes. She came home singing and dancing EVERY DAY! Excellent camp, well managed and very educational.

originalText.text:
This summer was my daughter’s first experience in a summer camp, and she absolutely loved it! She loved it so much to the point that she would be sad when the weekend had come and she couldn’t be at camp, and she also didn’t want to leave when we went to pick her up. She spent the past 7 weeks going to Bonjour, and while she has always spoke french at home (and at bilingual daycares/preschools), her french has visibly improved. We love that she went to the field trips every week and that she spent so much time outdoors.
We also loved the staff, and especially Lorraine, Yoane and her counselor Mike. Mike was really a big brother to our daughter and she absolutely loved him! Communication and organization has always been great too. This was her last week at Bonjour, but we are looking forward to sending her again next year. Thanks to the Bonjour staff, for making this a very special and memorable summer!
